apis.description: Returns the late policy for a course.

operations.notes: Returns the late policy for a course.

apis.description:
Create a late policy. If the course already has a late policy, a
bad_request is returned since there can only be one late policy
per course.

operations.notes:
Create a late policy. If the course already has a late policy, a

parameters.name: late_policy[missing_submission_deduction_enabled]
parameters.description: Whether to enable the missing submission deduction late policy.

parameters.name: late_policy[missing_submission_deduction]
parameters.description: How many percentage points to deduct from a missing submission.

parameters.name: late_policy[late_submission_deduction_enabled]
parameters.description: Whether to enable the late submission deduction late policy.

parameters.name: late_policy[late_submission_deduction]
parameters.description: How many percentage points to deduct per the late submission interval.

parameters.name: late_policy[late_submission_minimum_percent_enabled]
parameters.description: Whether to enable the late submission minimum percent for a late policy.

parameters.name: late_policy[late_submission_minimum_percent]

id.description: the unique identifier for the late policy

course_id.description: the unique identifier for the course

missing_submission_deduction_enabled.description: whether to enable missing submission deductions

missing_submission_deduction.description: amount of percentage points to deduct

late_submission_deduction_enabled.description: whether to enable late submission deductions

late_submission_deduction.description: amount of percentage points to deduct per late_submission_interval

late_submission_minimum_percent.description: the minimum score a submission can receive in percentage points
